PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-06932010-05-27,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectAgri-Recovery - 2010 Pasture Recovery Initiative
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide assistance through the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program under the AgriRecovery Framework to livestock producers affected by conditions of extreme drought in Central and Northern Alberta and West Central Saskatchewan, as well as to producers in British Columbia and Manitoba in the event these producers decide to join the initiative, through a contribution under the federal component of the 2010 Pasture Recovery Initiative.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Agri-Recovery - 2010 Pasture Recovery Initiative
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide assistance through the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program under the AgriRecovery Framework to livestock producers affected by conditions of extreme drought in Central and Northern Alberta and West Central Saskatchewan, as well as to producers in British Columbia and Manitoba in the event these producers decide to join the initiative, through a contribution under the federal component of the 2010 Pasture Recovery Initiative.
